title: Ping issues
body: I've been having really weird ping issues recently. Usually I hover around 60-70 ping stably, but recently my ping gets really unstable and it jumps around from 100-300 and never stays consistent. This is making it really difficult to enjoy the game as it gets really frustrating when my ping fluctuates so much. I live on the west coast and my ISP is Consolidated Communications.

replies.body: I am having the same issues, I am on east coast. I ran a speed test and it says my ping is perfectly fine but when i play a game it spikes and fluctuates.

last 4 days i have low ping and good fps and it just randomly freezes my champ everyone else is still fine and moving sometimes i can even still type just my champ is frozen :s ive died so many times like this and then sometimes it spikes to 100-150 ping then goes back down but mostly its freezing even when im at 35-40 ms

It sounds like there is an unstable connection between your computer and our game server.  Let's run a [Log Reader](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/209765743-Connection-Troubleshooting-Log-Reader) to find what went wrong and solve it for good!

Me too ever since last week every 5 seconds I get a giant ping spike up to 900 and I called up my internet provider who said nothing is wrong with it and Internet tests say my ping is good please help
